typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{GL-Code} as string,
		{GL-Desc} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Cash-Flow-Code} as string,
		{Parent-GL-Code} as string,
		Level as string,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
GetFirstGLcodeFromAnalyticsFunction select(mapColumn(
		{GL-Code},
		{GL-Desc},
		Category,
		{Cash-Flow-Code},
		{Parent-GL-Code},
		Level,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over({GL-Code}),
	asc({GL-Code}, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionGroupGLcode
AnalyticFunctionGroupGLcode filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstGLcodeFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
